mapper.select: select id, address_id, name, subtitle, url, link, icon_url, picture_url, parent_id, model_type, model_id, recommend_plate_id, pc_page, mobile_page, pc_desc, mobile_desc, tip from part where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into part(address_id, name, subtitle, url, link, icon_url, picture_url, parent_id, model_type, model_id, recommend_plate_id, pc_page, mobile_page, pc_desc, mobile_desc, tip) values (#{addressId}, #{name}, #{subtitle}, #{url}, #{link}, #{iconUrl}, #{pictureUrl}, #{parentId}, #{modelType}, #{modelId}, #{recommendPlateId}, #{pcPage}, #{mobilePage}, #{pcDesc}, #{mobileDesc}, #{tip})

insert into part(address_id, name, subtitle, url, link, icon_url, picture_url, parent_id, model_type, model_id, recommend_plate_id, pc_page, mobile_page, pc_desc, mobile_desc, tip) values
(#{entity.addressId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.subtitle}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.link}, #{entity.iconUrl}, #{entity.pictureUrl}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.modelType}, #{entity.modelId}, #{entity.recommendPlateId}, #{entity.pcPage}, #{entity.mobilePage}, #{entity.pcDesc}, #{entity.mobileDesc}, #{entity.tip})

insert into part(address_id, name, subtitle, url, link, icon_url, picture_url, parent_id, model_type, model_id, recommend_plate_id, pc_page, mobile_page, pc_desc, mobile_desc, tip) values
(#{entity.addressId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.subtitle}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.link}, #{entity.iconUrl}, #{entity.pictureUrl}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.modelType}, #{entity.modelId}, #{entity.recommendPlateId}, #{entity.pcPage}, #{entity.mobilePage}, #{entity.pcDesc}, #{entity.mobileDesc}, #{entity.tip})
on duplicate key update address_id = values(address_id), name = values(name), subtitle = values(subtitle), url = values(url), link = values(link), icon_url = values(icon_url), picture_url = values(picture_url), parent_id = values(parent_id), model_type = values(model_type), model_id = values(model_id), recommend_plate_id = values(recommend_plate_id), pc_page = values(pc_page), mobile_page = values(mobile_page), pc_desc = values(pc_desc), mobile_desc = values(mobile_desc), tip = values(tip)
mapper.update:
update part
address_id = #{addressId},
name = #{name},
subtitle = #{subtitle},
url = #{url},
link = #{link},
icon_url = #{iconUrl},
picture_url = #{pictureUrl},
parent_id = #{parentId},
model_type = #{modelType},
model_id = #{modelId},
recommend_plate_id = #{recommendPlateId},
pc_page = #{pcPage},
mobile_page = #{mobilePage},
pc_desc = #{pcDesc},
mobile_desc = #{mobileDesc},
tip = #{tip},
where id = #{id}
